birth_place.zh-cn: 江西省赣县梅林镇桃源村
birth_place.en: Taoyuan Village, Meilin Town, Gan County, Jiangxi Province

description.zh-cn: 中国水利工程学家，中国工程院院士。曾任天津大学校长、中华人民共和国教育部副部长，现任中国农业大学党委书记。
description.en: Chinese hydraulic engineering scientist and academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering. He previously served as President of Tianjin University, Vice Minister of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, and is currently the Party Secretary of China Agricultural University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国教育部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Minister of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国教育部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician currently serving as the Minister of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名高等学府，钟登华在此获得硕士和博士学位，并曾担任校长等多个职务。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education in China, where Zhong Denghua obtained his master's and doctoral degrees and held various positions, including President.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，曾任天津大学校长，是钟登华的前任。
description.en: Chinese educator who served as the President of Tianjin University and was Zhong Denghua's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家，接替钟登华担任天津大学校长。
description.en: Chinese scientist who succeeded Zhong Denghua as the President of Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 位于江西省赣州市赣县区的镇，是钟登华的出生地。
description.en: A town in Ganxian District, Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province, and the birthplace of Zhong Denghua.

description.zh-cn: 位于江西省南昌市的综合性大学。钟登华在此获得学士学位，其前身为江西工业大学。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province. Zhong Denghua obtained his bachelor's degree here when it was formerly known as Jiangxi Industrial University.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市的著名高等学府，钟登华现任该校党委书记。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education in Beijing, where Zhong Denghua currently serves as the Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国农业大学党委书记，是钟登华的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Party Secretary of China Agricultural University and was Zhong Denghua's predecessor.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2017年至2022年间的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leading body of the Communist Party of China from 2017 to 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十四届全国委员会（2023年-2028年）。
description.en: The 14th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (2023-2028).

nodes.id: 全国政协农业和农村委员会

zh-cn: 全国政协农业和农村委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工程科学技术界的最高荣誉性、咨询性学术机构。
description.en: The highest honorary and advisory academic institution in the field of engineering and technology in the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 钟登华于2019年2月15日至2023年1月19日期间担任中华人民共和国教育部副部长。
description.en: Zhong Denghua served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China from February 15, 2019, to January 19, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华担任教育部副部长期间，陈宝生是时任部长。
description.en: While Zhong Denghua was Vice Minister of Education, Chen Baosheng was the incumbent Minister.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华担任教育部副部长期间，怀进鹏是时任部长。
description.en: While Zhong Denghua was Vice Minister of Education, Huai Jinpeng was the incumbent Minister.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华在天津大学获得水资源与港湾工程系硕士学位和工学博士学位。
description.en: Zhong Denghua received his master's degree in Water Resources and Harbor Engineering and his PhD in Engineering from Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华于2016年9月至2019年2月担任天津大学校长。此前他还曾担任该校副校长、常务副校长等职务。
description.en: Zhong Denghua served as President of Tianjin University from September 2016 to February 2019. He had also previously held positions such as Vice President and Executive Vice President at the university.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华接替李家俊出任天津大学校长。
description.en: Zhong Denghua succeeded Li Jiajun as the President of Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 金东寒接替钟登华出任天津大学校长。
description.en: Jin Donghan succeeded Zhong Denghua as the President of Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华于1963年11月20日出生于江西省赣县梅林镇桃源村。
description.en: Zhong Denghua was born on November 20, 1963, in Taoyuan Village, Meilin Town, Gan County, Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华于1985年7月在江西工业大学（现南昌大学）土木建筑系获得学士学位。
description.en: Zhong Denghua received his bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from Jiangxi Industrial University (now Nanchang University) in July 1985.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华自2022年12月起担任中国农业大学党委书记。
description.en: Zhong Denghua has served as the Party Secretary of China Agricultural University since December 2022.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华接替姜沛民出任中国农业大学党委书记。
description.en: Zhong Denghua succeeded Jiang Peimin as the Party Secretary of China Agricultural University.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 2017年10月，钟登华在中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会上当选为中央委员会候补委员。
description.en: In October 2017, Zhong Denghua was elected as an alternate member of the Central Committee at the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，钟登华当选为第十四届全国政协委员。
description.en: In March 2023, Zhong Denghua was elected as a member of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 全国政协农业和农村委员会

description.zh-cn: 钟登华当选第十四届全国政协委员后，同时担任农业和农村委员会委员。
description.en: After being elected as a member of the 14th National Committee of the CPPCC, Zhong Denghua also serves as a member of the Committee for Agriculture and Rural Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 钟登华于2009年当选为中国工程院院士。
description.en: Zhong Denghua was elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering in 2009.
